text: Ahrar ul Hind (freedom fighters for India) was a militant group that split from the Tehrik-i-Taliban Pakistan in 2014 due to peace talks with the government of Pakistan. Ahrar ul Hind said that they would not accept any peace talks with Pakistan and claimed responsibility for many attacks of terrorism in Pakistan. Later that year, the group merged with another militant group Jamaat-ul-Ahrar. == References == Category:Taliban Category:Islamist militant groups
title: Ahrar-ul-Hind
